root.message: The SDG_RELATED_INDICATORS field for indicator 10-7-4, translated into all languages

languages.language: Goals 1 (“No Poverty”), 2 (“Zero Hunger”), 3 (“Good Health and Wellbeing”), 4 (“Quality Education”), 5 (“Gender Equality”), 8 (“Decent Work and Economic Growth”), and 16 (“Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions”).
